description.p: citrust is a fast, native 3DS ROM decryption tool built in Rust. It provides a gamepad-friendly GUI optimized for Steam Deck and SteamOS, with real-time progress tracking and support for all 3DS encryption methods.
BREAKING: Removed hardcoded encryption keys for DMCA compliance. External aes_keys.txt file is now required. GUI prompts for key file on first launch and saves keys automatically.
AppImage packaging for SteamOS/Steam Deck, content-based decryption detection, dependency updates.
Initial release with GUI decryption support.
